short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WeChat Web App on Chrome & Chrome OS

long.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,fil,:
***WeChat Web App***
微信 Chrome OS版

This Chrome App is compatible with Chrome Explorer and Chrome OS
此版本兼容Chrome浏览器和Chrome OS（Chromebook操作系统）

***Take note that this is not an official app from Wechat***
This is a fan project which meant to make people life easier. This app will launch Wechat Web official website. All credit goes to Wechat team

This is a fan project. This app will launch Wechat Web official website. All credit goes to Wechat (web.wechat.com).
